column1: 1,Navigate to Samsung Category and Verify Home Page,"Navigate to the home page, hover over an item, select Samsung from the category, contact support, and verify the home page.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 3: Click on link samsung -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 5: Click on link ContactNumber -> Navigate to page ''
Step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High,NEW
2,Complete Order for Case Product and Verify Thank You Page,Navigate to the home page, select a case product, increase quantity, fill shipping info, complete order, and verify the thank you page.","Step 1: Navigate to /

Step 5: Fill out shipping information and proceed to payment
